attributes.action: allow pubs to provide well ventilated, unstaffed smoking rooms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The smoking ban has had a devastating impact on the British pub industry.

I propose that the Government should allow publicans, where they wish, to provide well ventilated and unstaffed smoking rooms in their public houses to reinvigorate the struggling pub industry. 

Publicans should be free to make their own decisions in the interests of their business and I would argue that a privately designated smoking room, set aside specifically for smokers, is not "Public Space" for the purpose the EU directive. 

I urge people to sign my petition and support our pubs.

MIKE NATTRASS MEP
